SVGAttributeBias.summary: The bias attribute shifts the range of the filter. After applying the {{SVGAttr("kernelMatrix")}} of the feConvolveMatrix element to the input image to yield a number and applied the {{SVGAttr("divisor")}} attribute, the bias attribute is added to each component. This allows representation of values that would otherwise be clamped to 0 or 1.
